00035 CUserSocket *FindUserSock(u_int id) 
00036 {
00037         for (CUserSocket *u = userTable[id&U_HASHMASK]; u; u = u->nextU)
00038         {
00039                 #ifdef _DBEUG
00040                 if (u->magicNumber != MAGIC_NUMBER) 
00041                 {
00042                         journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, FATAL_ERROR_MSG, 0, "MagicNumber corruption found!");
00043                         logEntry(MagicNumber_corruption);
00044                         #ifdef WIN32
00045                                 _asm int 3
00046                         #endif
00047                 }
00048                 #endif
00049 
00050                 if (u->connectId == id)
00051                         return u;
00052         }
00053         return NULL;
00054  }

00066 void CUserListenSocket::HandleInput() 
00067 {
00068         SOCKET new_sock;
00069         u_int theipaddr;
00070 
00071         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00072 
00073         new_sock = AcceptConnection(&theipaddr);
00074 
00075         int x = 1;
00076         setsockopt(new_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_DONTLINGER, (char *)&x, sizeof(x));
00077 
00078         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00079 
00080         if (new_sock != INVALID_SOCKET)
00081         {
00082                 new CUserSocket(new_sock, theipaddr);
00083         }
00084  }
